title: Love Monster
overview: The series follows the colourful and funny adventures of lovable hairy hero Love Monster as he searches for the right thing to do in a world in which he is one of a kind.Showcasing the importance of kindness, empathy, connection and instinct, Love Monster is full of heart and â€˜big life' learnings for little ones. By watching his adventures as he navigates the challenges involved in being a bit funny looking in a world of cute fluffy things, the young audience at home can also learn to cope with different emotions.
